title: [Large-Scale] Self-Directed Massive Open Online Course (MOOC) Design Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in online learning platform usage
context.additional_context: Focuses on strengthening professionals' capacity to acquire foundational scientific knowledge and sustain self-directed learning, with project-based assessments producing actionable learning outcomes.

learning_goals: Learners can explain content structuring strategies that promote self-directed learning when designing MOOCs (Massive Open Online Courses)
Learners can design learning modules by applying interactive design techniques to enhance learning immersion
Learners can measure and improve learning outcomes by designing a project-based assessment system
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
